author: protolambda
content: Eth2stats was originally created by Alethio, but they stopped. The eth2stats dash, server and client are open source though. And I'm maintaining the stats-client with updates for beacon client compatibility. However, no changes necessary here I think. Simply change the type flag from "teku" to "v1" to use eth2stats with a compliant v1 API
